level.heading: Applicability.
level.text: This subchapter and section 13 of D.C. Law 15-35 shall apply to all vehicles impounded after October 28, 2003. This subchapter and section 13 of D.C. Law 15-35 shall also apply to all vehicles impounded prior to October 28, 2003, provided that notice is sent to the owners and lien holders in accordance with the provisions of § 50-2421.07(b) or (c), as is applicable.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-354 validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of this section, see § 15 of Removal and Disposition of Abandoned and Other Unlawfully Parked Vehicles Reform Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2003 (D.C. Act 15-171, October 6, 2003, 50 DCR 9163).
